  • Sell With Us

You’re in control of how to sale your home.

Explore all your selling options, and pick the one that works best for you.

Sell your home directly to Us

The perfect selling option for those who love convenience and control.

  • Competitive Cash offer

    Sell directly to us and get paid in 24 hours, so you’ll have the cash you need to buy your next home.

  • Skip staging and showings

    Do a video walkthrough and skip the showings. If repairs are needed, you can let us handle the work.

  • Choose your closing date

    With Discoverize, you can pick any date to work with your schedule up to 90 days after you accept our offer.

  • Extended Stay

    No need to close and move on the same day or move twice if your new home isn’t ready so you don’t have to rush.

Sell Now

List your home at Discoverize

We’ll help you put your home on the market to get a great offer.

  • Test the Market

    See how the market respond to your home and get chance to attract multiple offers from around the world.

  • Dedicated Experts and Support

    From setting the right list price to closing, you’ll be supported by local industry experts and Support.

  • Save on fees

    With just 5% in fees, you'll pay 1% less than the traditional 6% and means thousands in savings.

  • The Power of Discoverize

    With billion user that visiting Discoverize every hour you'll surprise with all the offers you'll get.

List Now
